name: Banners Begone!
description:
Requirements:
  • You'll need a PC with Chrome, Firefox or Safari browser installed
  • You'll need a mouse with at least left and right mouse buttons
  • Most of the gameplay consists of clicking. Any specific action will be hinted in-game
  • Have fun!

 

P.S.

This game’s idea and prototype were concieved during Incremental Game Jam back in August 2020. Big thanks to guys over there for inspiring “Banners Begone!”. So glad I found the time and strength to actually finish this game.

 

Get in touch on my Discord server or on Twitter
